# PR rules

* You **MUST** follow all steps and requirements in [CONTRIBUTING.md](../../CONTRIBUTING#pull-request-creation)
* Use the MCP tool GitKraken/pull_request_create to create a PR
* Use the MCP tool GitKraken/pull_request_get_comments to review PR comments
* Use the MCP tool GitKraken/pull_request_get_detail to get details on PR quality
* Use the Codacy MCP server tools to examine the quality checks on a PR
